mil3.7.3:4.2: “bhante nāgasena, kiṃ tumhe atītassa dukkhassa pahānāya vāyamathā”ti?
mil3.7.3:4.4: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, anāgatassa dukkhassa pahānāya vāyamathā”ti?
mil3.7.3:4.8: “Yadi tumhe na atītassa dukkhassa pahānāya vāyamatha, na anāgatassa dukkhassa pahānāya vāyamatha, na paccuppannassa dukkhassa pahānāya vāyamatha, atha kimatthāya vāyamathā”ti.
mil3.7.3:4.10: ‘kinti, mahārāja, idañca dukkhaṃ nirujjheyya, aññañca dukkhaṃ nuppajjeyyā’ti etadatthāya vāyamāmā”ti.
mil3.7.3:5.1: “Atthi pana te, bhante nāgasena, anāgataṃ dukkhan”ti?
mil3.7.3:5.3: “Tumhe kho, bhante nāgasena, atipaṇḍitā, ye tumhe asantānaṃ anāgatānaṃ dukkhānaṃ pahānāya vāyamathā”ti?
mil3.7.3:5.4: “Atthi pana te, mahārāja, keci paṭirājāno paccatthikā paccāmittā paccupaṭṭhitā hontī”ti?
mil3.7.3:5.6: “Kiṃ nu kho, mahārāja, tadā tumhe parikhaṃ khaṇāpeyyātha, pākāraṃ cināpeyyātha gopuraṃ kārāpeyyātha, aṭṭālakaṃ kārāpeyyātha, dhaññaṃ atiharāpeyyāthā”ti?
mil3.7.3:5.7: “Na hi, bhante, paṭikacceva taṃ paṭiyattaṃ hotī”ti.
mil3.7.3:5.8: “Kiṃ tumhe, mahārāja, tadā hatthismiṃ sikkheyyātha, assasmiṃ sikkheyyātha, rathasmiṃ sikkheyyātha, dhanusmiṃ sikkheyyātha, tharusmiṃ sikkheyyāthā”ti?
mil3.7.3:5.9: “Na hi, bhante, paṭikacceva taṃ sikkhitaṃ hotī”ti.
mil3.7.3:5.12: “Kiṃ nu kho, mahārāja, atthi anāgataṃ bhayan”ti?
mil3.7.3:5.14: “Tumhe ca kho, mahārāja, atipaṇḍitā, ye tumhe asantānaṃ anāgatānaṃ bhayānaṃ paṭibāhanatthāya paṭiyādethā”ti.
mil3.7.3:6.2: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, yadā tvaṃ pipāsito bhaveyyāsi, tadā tvaṃ udapānaṃ khaṇāpeyyāsi, pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpeyyāsi, taḷākaṃ khaṇāpeyyāsi ‘pānīyaṃ pivissāmī’”ti?
mil3.7.3:6.3: “Na hi, bhante, paṭikacceva taṃ paṭiyattaṃ hotī”ti.
mil3.7.3:6.8: “Tumhe kho, mahārāja, atipaṇḍitā, ye tumhe asantānaṃ anāgatānaṃ pipāsānaṃ paṭibāhanatthāya taṃ paṭiyādethā”ti.
mil3.7.3:7.2: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mahārāja, yadā tvaṃ bubhukkhito bhaveyyāsi, tadā tvaṃ khettaṃ kasāpeyyāsi, sāliṃ vapāpeyyāsi ‘bhattaṃ bhuñjissāmī’”ti?
mil3.7.3:7.3: “Na hi, bhante, paṭikacceva taṃ paṭiyattaṃ hotī”ti.
mil3.7.3:7.8: “Tumhe kho, mahārāja, atipaṇḍitā, ye tumhe asantānaṃ anāgatānaṃ bubhukkhānaṃ paṭibāhanatthāya paṭiyādethā”ti.
